Based on the soft labels provided, it seems that the statement "You should always give your kids financial advice" is somewhat controversial, with 25% of the raters labeling it as such. However, the majority of the raters (50%) labeled it as a common belief, indicating that many people would agree with this statement. Therefore, my prediction for the soft label of this text would be 3.
